songs.title: Traffic Stop
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I like BBC, hoodies, and stuff
Bape-made kickers, yeah, that's what's up
Hard denim jeans, same cut, different pocket
Everybody knows it's all about that back pocket
Diamonds on my neck, d-diamonds on my grill
Skittle colored, taste the rainbow
Wrist on chill, yeah, yeah, I spent a couple mill'
That's okay, 'cause Teyana got a deal

[Chorus]
S-sitting at the bus stop, sucking on a lollipop in my ice cream top
I can make the traffic stop, I can make the traffic stop
I-I can make the, I can make the
S-sitting at the bus stop, sucking on a lollipop in my ice cream top
I can make the traffic stop, I can make the traffic stop
I-I can make the, I can make the traffic stop

[Verse 2]
I like skateboards, bikes, and things
Backed in the back of that all white thing
Keys, keys jingling, no license
Boys screaming, I'm so sweet, sixteen
Speaking of which, y'all know the party
Y'all know who fell through just like Barbie
Who brought the eighties back like that old Atari
Y'all know Teyana get the party started
It's so crazy, so retarded
I'm so New York, I'm so damn Harlem
Check it, Pharrell said, I beg your pardon (hold up)
I ain't even gotta look no farther (she's nuts)
My swagger is oh-so mean
Number one draft pick on that Star Trek team
You know, yeah, yeah, you know mean
Yeah, all the traffic stops when I'm on the scene, come on

[Chorus]
S-sitting at the bus stop, sucking on a lollipop in my ice cream top
I can make the traffic stop, I can make the traffic stop
I-I can make the, I can make the
S-sitting at the bus stop, sucking on a lollipop in my ice cream top
I can make the traffic stop, I can make the traffic stop
I-I can make the, I can make the traffic stop

[Verse 3]
I'm the girl with the real big hair
Bamboo earrings, got about two pairs (wipe me down)
Got about 2 pairs (Wipe me down), got about 2 pairs
I'm the girl with the real big hair
Bamboo earrings, got about two pairs (wipe me down)
Oh, got about two pairs (wipe me down)
Oh, got about two pairs

[Chorus]
S-sitting at the bus stop, sucking on a lollipop in my ice cream top
I can make the traffic stop, I can make the traffic stop
I-I can make the, I can make the
S-sitting at the bus stop, sucking on a lollipop in my ice cream top
I can make the traffic stop, I can make the traffic stop
I-I can make the, I can make the traffic stop
